content: संगः [संज् भावे घञ्] {@--1@} Coming together, joining. {@--2@} Meeting, union, confluence (as of rivers). {@--3@} Touch, contact. {@--4@} Company, association, friendship, friendly intercourse; सतां सद्भिः संगः कथमपि हि पुण्येन भवति <ls>U. 2. 1</ls>; संगमनुव्रज् ‘to keep company with, herd with’; मृगाः मृगैः संगमनुव्रजंति <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--5@} Attachment, fondness, desire; ध्यायतो विषयान्पुंसः संगस्तेषूपजायते <ls>Bg. 2. 62.</ls> {@--6@} Attachment to worldly ties, association with men; दौर्मंत्र्यान्नृपतिर्विनश्यति यतिः संगात् <ls>Bh. 2. 42</ls>; विमुक्त° <ls>Ku. 1. 53</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 169.</ls> {@--7@} Encounter, fight. {@--8@} Hindrance, obstruction; <ls>R. 2. 42</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 63.</ls>
